Building next-generation blockchain-based financial infrastructure

About Company

Gemini Teknologi Indonesia (GEMTEK) is a startup technology company that builds Next-Gen blockchain-based data infrastructure. In addition, by massively adopting the Web 3.0 economy, it can be a bridge in every economic transaction on Web 3.0 such as Metaverse, NFT, and others.

Decentrallized Finance

Access and engage in the DeFi ecosystem

LEARN MORE

NFT Experiences

Build your collection. Mint, Sell and Trade NFTs.

LEARN MORE

Other Solutions

Asset management, capital markets, digital currencies, and global trade.

LEARN MORE

Interoperability & Scalabillity

Interoperability and scalability are currently the bottlenecks preventing mass adoption of blockchain technology. Development of an interoperable and scalable network that promotes a truly decentralised, permissionless and secure blockchain as well as one that enables micro validation is the main goal of this project.

Content title

Interoperability & Scalabillity

Interoperability and scalability are currently the bottlenecks preventing mass adoption of blockchain technology. Development of an interoperable and scalable network that promotes a truly decentralised, permissionless and secure blockchain as well as one that enables micro validation is the main goal of this project.
